body_text:
There are conv unit tests in kernel_tests.
…
On Sun, Oct 22, 2017, 2:25 AM vs-zhehangd ***@***.***> wrote:
 Ok, let me take a look and see how to do it.

 On Sun, 22 Oct 2017 at 2:23 AM Yan Facai (颜发才) ***@***.***>
 wrote:

 > Hi, @vs-zhehangd <https://github.com/vs-zhehangd> . I get a cold, would
 > you like to take over the issue? The fix is pretty easy as you suggested,
 > however, we'd better create a nn_ops_test.py and write more unit tests.
 > It's not difficult, but perhaps a little cumbersome for new contributor.
 > Thanks.

body:
There are conv unit tests in kernel_tests.
